resources.string: You are offline. Please check your internet connection and try again.

string-array.name: QuotesList
string-array.item: "Dont be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try."
"Cherish your human connections your relationships with friends and family."
"Its not what we have in life. But who we have in our life matters."
"Family is where life begins and love never ends."
"Family is not an important thing. Its everything."
"If you want something you never had. You have to do something you have never done."
"Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten."
"When trouble comes its your family that supports you."
"A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out."
"True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable."
"A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down."
"Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together."
"Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer."
"Our family is a circle of strength of love with every birth and every union the circle grows."
"The love of a family is one of the greatest blessing in our life.
"Family is what happens when two people fall in love."
"A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails."
"Once in a while right in the middle of an ordinary life love gives us a fairy tale."
"The best time to make friends is before you need them."
"Sticking with your family is what makes it a family."
"I would rather walk with a friend in the dark than alone in the light."
"The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home."
"If you want to change the world, go home and love your family."
"Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst."
"A friend who understands your tears is much more valuable than a lot of friends who only know your smile."
"Blood makes you related. Loyalty makes you family."
"Life is an awful ugly place to not have a best friend."
"You dont choose your family. They are Gods gift to you as you are to them."
"Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies."
"Family, friends and relationships are the blessings of the God. They are the best way to access God."
"Life without friendship is like the sky without the sun."
"Real family does not come from your blood. It is the people standing beside you when no one else is."
"Friends find the sweetest sense of happiness comes from simple being together."
"Your family is the best team you could ever have."
"Friends can make you laugh like no one else can."
"Often we think of love in terms of people, whether they are friends, family, or romantic partners."
"People with the greatest advice usually have the most problems."

resources.string: This Love Advice Android Application is developed by our IT Project team for the Senior High Students of STI Academic Center Caloocan and also a requirements for IT Special Project.

string-array.name: FamilyCategory
string-array.item: "You are more important than your problems."
"If you do not stand for something, you will fall for anything."
"Find the one who makes your heart smile."
"Family are the ones who would do anything to see you smile and who loves you."
"A family is a little world created by love."
"People come and go in our lives, but a beauty of life is that our family is always there."
"We do not need sugar, flour or rice or anything else. We just want to see our dear ones."
"Family is the most important thing in the world."
"Family, we may not have it all together but together we have it all."
"Family is like music, some high notes, some low notes, but always a beautiful song."
"I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each others."
"Family is not always about blood, sometimes its about who is there to support you when you need them."
"It does not matter what kind of problems a family is having, it should always stay in the family."
"The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk."
"You dont choose your family. They are Gods gift to you, as you are to them."

string-array.name: FriendsCategory
string-array.item: "Be with someone who brings out the best in you."
"A friend is the one that knows you as you are and understands where you have been."
"Best friends make the good times better and the hard times easier."
"A true friend is the best Possession."
"Friends are Gods way of taking care of us."
"Friendship is one mind in two bodies."
"Keep your friends close, your enemies even closer."
"No better relation than a prudent and faithful friend."
"There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship."
"Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity."
"A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself."
"Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness."
"One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood."
"A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out."
"No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow."

string-array.name: SpecialCategory
string-array.item: "A person who loves you truly will never let you go whatever the situation is."
"A good relationship consists of two people who accept each others past and support each others future."
"Love is not love until you give it away."
"If you cannot be happy and content by yourself then you should not be in a relationship."
"Relationships are the flavors of life."
"You can tell how often a person thinks of you by how often they tell you they think of you."
"Never love anybody that treats you like you are ordinary."
"If your love for another person does not include loving yourself then your love is incomplete."
"Love cannot live where there is no trust."
"Do not settle for a relationship that would not let you be yourself."
"Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you."
"The best person to talk to about the problems in your relationship is the person you are in a relationship with."
"Assumptions are the termites of relationships."
"In general, the problem in a relationship is when the couple stagnate."
"Problems in relationship occur because each person is concentrating on what is missing in the other person."

string-array.name: GlossaryList
string-array.item: Enraged very angry or furious
Furious full of anger or energy
Frustrated feeling or expressing distress and annoyance
Shocked cause to feel surprised and upset
Livid furiously angry
Frightened afraid or anxious
Nervous easily agitated or alarmed
Restless unable to rest or relax as result of anxiety
Fuming feel, show or express great anger
Apprehensive fearful that something bad will happen
Worried anxious about potential problems
Annoyed slightly angry or irritated
Repulsed cause to feel intense distaste and aversion
Troubled showing distress or anxiety
Uneasy feeling anxiety and uncomfortable
Peeved annoy or irritate
Surprised feeling or showing surprise
Upbeat cheerful or optimistic
Motivated motive for doing something
Ecstatic feeling overwhelming joyful excitement
Hyper hyperactive or unusually energetic
Cheerful noticeably happy and optimistic
Inspired arising from some external creative impulse
Elated ecstatically happy
Energized give vitality and enthusiasm to
Lively full of life and energy
Optimistic hopeful and confident
Thrilled sudden feeling of excitement and pleasure
Pleasant sense of happy satisfaction
Joyful feeling great pleasure and happiness
Proud satisfaction as a result of ones own achievements
Blissful extremely happy and joy
Disgusted to feel revulsion or disapproval
Disappointed sad because someone has failed to fulfill ones hopes
Glum looking or feeling dejected
Ashamed embarrassed or guilty of ones action
Mortified to feel ashamed or humiliated
Alienated to feel isolated or estranged
Mopey gloomily and persistently about something
Apathetic showing no interest or concern
Embarrassed feeling or showing embarrassment
Excluded deny access from a place or privilege
Timid lack of courage or confidence
Drained deprived of strength or vitality
Alone having no one else present on ones own
Down unhappy and depressed
Bored feeling unoccupied or lacks interest
Tired no longer fresh or in good condition
Blessed enjoying the bliss of heaven
At Ease free from worry and feel relaxed
Content state of peaceful happiness
Fulfilled happy of developing ones abilities
Humble showing a modest of ones own importance
Secure fixed so as not to give away
Chill very relaxed or easygoing
Grateful showing an appreciation of kindness
Calm not showing of nervousness or other emotions
Satisfied contented and pleased
Relaxed free from tension and anxiety
Carefree free from responsibility
Relieved no longer feeling of distressed
Restful having a quiet and soothing quality
Tranquil free from disturbance
Serene calm, peaceful and untroubled

resources.string: The easiest way to organize your day effectively!
See different quotes and advice from the 3 of the major categories of love!
Search within the app about different kinds of feelings and emotions!
Take the assessment with the categories you have problems with and get an advice from the app!
A real-time conversation between you and your counselor through the app for further counseling!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
